title: TowerWatch - PVP Battle
description: TowerWatch - PVP Battle is a tower defense game to fight the horde and other players using guns, traps, and magic. Battle and defend your tower in PVE & PVP Battles. Earn XP to upgrade your heroes & traps. Earn Battle Pass XP to win amazing skins, props, and rewards. Defend the Tower and defeat the evil forces!
